Functions

Flash

Handles sessionwide variables.  Used for example to notify the user about form action, ie. was operation executed succesfully.

Summary
Flash
Handles sessionwide variables.
Version
$Id: Flash.php 193 2007-11-13 01:12:59Z aapo.laakkonen $
License

Functions
set
Sets a session variable.
get
Returns the specified session variable, if one is set.
has
Checks whether a session variable by this name is set.
remove
Removes the specified session variable.

set

public static function set($key,  
$value,  
$hops =  1)

Sets a session variable.

Parameters

string $keyname of the variable.
string $valuevalue of the variable.
string $hopsnumber of requests the variable is available.

get

public static function get($key =  null)

Returns the specified session variable, if one is set.

Parameters

string $keyname of the variable.

Returns

The variable if it is set.

has

public static function has($key =  null)

Checks whether a session variable by this name is set.

Parameters

string $keyname of the variable.

Returns

trueif the variable is set.
falseif the varaible is not set.
